summary: A comedian on stage tells a joke about KFC. He states that KFC is one letter away from being F-U-C-K and then introduces a new slogan: "KFC, the only thing missing is you."
transcript: Did you know that the KFC is one letter away from being F-U-C-K? I came up with a brand new slogan. KFC, the only thing missing is you. Family F*ck Bucket please.
